 Collection<Message> OutboundInboundHandler.listMessages(Connection conn, MessageCriteria criteria)
          If the direction is null, it retrieves the messages from both handlers, otherwise, if the direction is Direction#OUTBOUND, it retrieves the messages only from the outbound handler, and if it is Direction#INBOUND, retrieves only the messages from the inbound handler.

          Retrieves the messages that matches the criteria.
